disk.frame 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to `disk.frame` - larger-than-RAM data manipulation framework

Reference

All functions

add_chunk()

Add a chunk to the disk.frame

add_meta()

Add metadata to the disk.frame

add_var_to_scorecard()

Add one variable to the XGBoost scorecard

as.data.frame(<disk.frame>)

Convert disk.frame to data.frame by collecting all chunks

as.data.table(<disk.frame>)

Convert disk.frame to data.table by collecting all chunks

as.disk.frame()

Make a data.frame into a disk.frame

auc()

compute Area under the Curve (AUC)

collect(<disk.frame>) collect_list()

Bring the disk.frame into R as data.table/data.frame

colnames() names(<disk.frame>)

Return the column names of the disk.frame

compat_as_lazy()

Internal method replicating dplyr's compat_as_lazy_dots as it's not exported

compat_as_lazy_dots()

Internal method replicating dplyr's compat_as_lazy_dots as it's not exported

compute(<disk.frame>)

Perform the computation

csv_to_disk.frame()

convert a CSV file to disk.frame format

disk.frame()

Create a disk.frame

disk.frame_folder() disk.frame_fst()

Create a data frame pointed to a folder

select_(<disk.frame>) rename_(<disk.frame>) filter_(<disk.frame>) mutate_(<disk.frame>) transmute_(<disk.frame>) arrange_(<disk.frame>) summarise_(<disk.frame>) do_(<disk.frame>) glimpse(<disk.frame>)

dplyr version implemented for disk.frame

evalparseglue()

Helper function to evalparse some glue::glue string

foverlaps.disk.frame()

Apply data.table's foverlaps to the disk.frame

gen_datatable_synthetic()

Generate synthetic dataset for testing

get_chunk()

Obtain one chunk by chunk id

get_chunk_ids()

Get the chunk file names

groups(<disk.frame>) group_by(<disk.frame>) group_by_(<disk.frame>)

Group

hard_group_by()

Perform a group by and ensuring that every unique grouping of by is in the same chunk

head(<disk.frame>) tail(<disk.frame>)

Head of the disk.frame

is.file.disk.frame() is.dir.disk.frame()

Checks if the df is a single-file based disk.frame

is_disk.frame()

Checks if a folder is a disk.frame

is_ready()

is the disk.frame ready from a long running non-blocking process

anti_join(<disk.frame>) full_join(<disk.frame>) inner_join(<disk.frame>) left_join(<disk.frame>) semi_join(<disk.frame>)

Performs join/merge for disk.frames

map.disk.frame() imap.disk.frame() chunk_lapply()

Apply the same function to all chunks

lazy() delayed()

Lazy chunk_lapply wrapper

map_by_chunk_id()

Perform a function on both disk.frames x and y, each chunk of x and y gets run by fn(x.chunk, y.chunk)

merge(<disk.frame>)

Merge function for disk.frames

nchunks() nchunk()

Return the number of chunks

ncol()

Number of columns

nrow()

Number of rows of disk.frame

overwrite_check()

Check if the outdir exists or not

play()

Internal methods

print(<disk.frame>)

a new print method for disk.frame

print(<xgdf_scorecard>)

Print xgboost scorecard

progressbar()

Show a progress bar of the action being performed

rbindlist.disk.frame()

rbindlist disk.frames together

rechunk()

Increase or decrease the number of chunks in the disk.frame

recommend_nchunks()

Computes the recommended number of chunks to break a data.frame into

record()

Internal methods

remove_chunk()

removes a chunk from the disk.frame

sample_frac(<disk.frame>)

Sample n rows from a disk.frame

sas_to_csv() sas_to_disk.frame()

Convert a SAS file (.sas7bdat) format to CSV by chunks

setup_disk.frame()

Set up disk.frame environment

distribute() shard()

Distribute (chunk-up/break-up) a fst file into chunks into a folder; an alias for shard

shardkey()

Returns the shardkey (not implemented yet)

srckeep()

Keep only the variables from the input listed in selections

`[`(<disk.frame>)

[ interface for disk.frame using fst backend

tbl_vars(<disk.frame>)

Returns the names of the columns. Needed for RStudio to complete variable names

write_disk.frame() output_disk.frame()

Write out a data.frame/disk.frame to a disk.frame location

zip_to_disk.frame() validate_zip_to_disk.frame()

Automatically read and convert every single CSV file within the zip file to disk.frame format
